content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'corner1': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a 3D printed groove structure with the highlighted section at a corner. The groove transitions direction, requiring uniform compliance.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
